downloadTitle: MVP Session 18: Use Layers to Organize Complex Diagrams in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Practice using layers to organize complex diagrams in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 18.
detailsSection: Practice using layers to organize complex diagrams in Visio 2010 with this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 18. MVP Sessions Video 18 covers how you can use layers in Visio 2010 to better organize your diagrams, whether you are working on space plans, mechanical drawings, or any other measured drawings. Use this working file to follow along with the video and practice grouping relevant shapes into layers and manipulating how to display each layer based on end user needs.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Use Layers to Organize Complex Diagrams video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Session-18-Use-layers-to-organize-complex-diagrams.aspx).
